PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11662019-08-07,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectActs of the Third Extraordinary Congress of the Universal Postal Union
PrecisOrder Authorizing (a) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to delegate authority to represent, to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ACTS OF THE THIRD EXTRAORDINARY CONGRESS OF THE UNIVERSAL POSTAL UNION, to be held in Geneva from September 24 to 25, 2019; or (b) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to represent, to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ACTS OF THE THIRD EXTRAORDINARY CONGRESS OF THE UNIVERSAL POSTAL UNION, to be held in Geneva from September 24 to 25, 2019.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
